title: Introduction of a new Cancellation Order Operation in O3 O-POM
description:
Description
Introducing a new operation to support cancellation process in O3-OPOM. 
  The new operation Cancellation should be conformed to TMF-622 specification: It works asynchronously, creates the events and supports the defined states.
  More over in: https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2091085091
                      https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/O3+Cancellation+of+Order
  This new operation will support new cancellation processes such as GGS cancellation process. It should be generic for other new cancellation processes of other production lines.
